Description.English: Hovering over Items will show buffs the modder can define in the Costs property. Eg. to show buffs the projectile of that item will cause on targets (there is no way to automatically fetch this for display)

KnownIssues.English: Does not display buffs if a mod or more likely 'creative mode' removed the costs of assets (I add costs to the Items to use this as helper for the display, has no impact to the game)
